text: [Music]
long long ago near a lake far away a
drummer wandered to enjoy the starlit
night
when he came upon the bank of the lake
he found a few pieces of linen so fine
as he had never seen before seeing no
one around he picked up one piece of
linen and put it in his pocket
it would make a fine soft pillow spread
that night as he was sleeping in his hut
he heard a knock who might be at this
hour who are you and what brings you
here at this hour I am a princess and I
am under a witch's spell the witch has
trapped me on top of the Glass Mountain
I had come here to have a dip in the
lake but without the piece of linen that
you took I cannot fly back oh I am so
sorry I picked it up only because I saw
no one around can you please give it
back to me
[Music]
certainly but you seem to be in great
despair is there a way I could rescue
you to rescue me you will have to come
to the top of the Glass Mountain once
you get there most of the enchantment
will be broken after that I can rescue
myself but it will be impossible for you
to reach the glass now huh impossible is
only for those who do not try tell me
where the glass mountain is princess the
Glass Mountain is a thousand miles
beyond the dark forest which is full of
mighty Giants I must leave now and I can
tell you no more
the drummer was a brave fellow who
feared nothing so he set out towards the
dark forest when he reached there he
beat his drum so loud that the entire
forest seemed to shake with the sound
the Giants heard the noise who dare
breaks the Peace of my forest it is I
the drummer come out to face me at your
own risk you puny little fellow do you
not fear us I would have feared you had
I been alone but with this drum
I have called all my people to tell them
that I have found you and what can
little humans like you do to watch joy
so we can crush a thousand of you under
our feet do not underestimate us
we humans are thinkers we will hide
behind the trees in the forest and so in
your attempt to crush us you will end up
destroying your own forest then when you
are tired and have no forests we will
attack you with fire you really think
humans can do that to us
well if they couldn't they wouldn't send
just one fellow alone to find us right
so what do we do now there is only one
thing to do
I can ask my people to turn back and
leave you in peace but you must do one
thing for me we shall do anything you
say
just spare us the fire very well then
you must take me to the top of the glass
mountain
all right we can get you there in an
instant what tell your people not to
come yeah that sure so the drummer began
beating his drum again and the Giants
thought he was asking his people to turn
back the giant placed the drummer in his
palm and passed him from one giant palm
to the next giant palm each hand of each
giant extending out to a mile soon the
drummer was at the top of the glass
Mountain Thank You Giants welcome just
ask your people to spare us of that you
need not worry we shall never bother you
again
the Giants were relieved and they left
when he reached the top he saw no one
there was one tiny Hut he knocked at the
door and at the third knock a which
opens again how did you reach the top of
this mountain it is impossible for
anyone to get here impossible is only
for someone who does not try will a
traveler get some food and shelter here
but for that you must do some work for
me for two days I shall do whatever you
ask of me
you must do this before the first star
comes out at night as you find it
impossible impossible is only for those
who do not try there must be some
strange witch key magical reason for
this strange task or else the witch
might have killed me maybe there is a
way to empty the pond with this so the
drummer went to the pond with the
thimble and started removing the water
but he could get out only a few drops at
a time and there was no way he could
empty the pond in time by noon it was
quite tired just said the princess came
out of the house with a basket of food
she spoke to him whilst he ate don't
worry I will empty the pond with magic
you just lie down here and sleep the
princess turned the ring on her finger
and immediately the pond dried up when
the witch came to inspect the pond at
night she was bewildered this is
impossible impossible is only for those
who do not try tomorrow you must make me
a thousand bouquets of flowers each from
that forest before the first star comes
out at night the drummer went into the
forest and looked and searched but he
found not a single flower by noon he was
quite tired
once again the princess came to him with
a basket of food she spoke to him whilst
he ate don't worry I will make the
bouquet with magic you just lie down
here and sleep
the princess turned the ring on her
finger and immediately there appeared a
thousand bouquets of a hundred flowers
each when the witch came to inspect them
at night she was astonished impossible
is only for those who do not try as soon
as the witch heard this she
disintegrated and disappeared I am free
you freed me drummer how did I do that
the spell the witch had put on me could
be broken only if someone tried to
rescue me and did three impossible tasks
the first task was for you to get here
once you reached the top of the mountain
which the witch thought would never
happen she lost most of her power on me
and then when you agreed to do the other
impossible tasks she could not stop me
from using the magic of my ray princess
I know I am just a drummer but do you
think you could um like me you are the
brave man who risked his life to rescue
a stranger no I do not like you my
drummer I respect you and yes
I love you too
will you spend the rest of your life
with me yes for that we must leave this
place go into the hut and get yourself
the witch's treasures
so the drummer went into the hut and saw
that it was full of gold and precious
stones and jewels of all kinds
he got sack falls of it the princess
picked up two things a beautiful emerald
ring and a necklace of rubies and gold
then it was time to leave the princess
turned her ring and immediately she and
the drummer reached the gates of her
palace but before they could enter the
drummer stopped her I wish to visit my
parents and tell them I am back and well
yes certainly but you must promise me
not to kiss them for the moment you do
you will not remember me anymore how can
I forget you my dear I shall be back in
no time
so the drummer went to meet his parents
and there was such joy and celebration
and affection that he forgot his promise
to the princess and kissed both his
parents he lost all memory of the
princess with the treasures he had got
they built a huge castle our rich
nobleman's daughter was chosen for him
as a bride
the princess was waiting at the gates of
the palace but when the drummer did not
return she realized what had happened
she went looking for him and soon heard
of his wedding she mixed with the throng
of servants going in and out of the
mansion and soon spotted the bride-to-be
oh sorry madam my show me that ring it
is beautiful I have never seen anything
prettier in my life yes thank you
won't you sell it to me oh no I will pay
you whatever you want for it but I must
have it
I shall wear it for my wedding very well
you may have it but in return you must
allow me to meet your fiance alone for a
few minutes just as the first star comes
out at night the bride-to-be
wanted the ring so badly that she agreed
but at night she mixed a sleeping powder
in his water such that when the princess
came to meet him the drummer was fast
asleep and he did not hear her knock
open the door my beloved drummer don't
you remember I'm a glimpse of my magic
ring and you shall recall the glass
Mountain the witch and all please just
open the door the princess cried and
pleaded the whole night but the drummer
remained fast asleep the next day she
came back to the mansion
ah sorry ma'am
ma hi
show me the necklace it it is beautiful
I have never seen anything more gorgeous
in my life yes thank you
won't you sell it to me oh no I will pay
you whatever you want for it but I must
have it I shall wear it for my wedding
very well you may have it but in return
you must allow me to meet your fiance
alone for a few minutes
just as the first star comes out at
night the bride-to-be wanted the
necklace so badly that she agreed but at
night she mixed a sleeping powder in his
water so that he might sleep when the
princess knocked on his door but this
time the drummer's parents who had heard
the princess's cries at the previous
night had told him all about it the
drummer realized that the only way he
could have remained asleep was because
something was put in his water so he did
not drink any and sat waiting for the
princess soon he heard a knock
[Music]
open the door my beloved drama don't you
remember one glimpse of my magic ring
him you shall recall the glass now from
the weights and all please just open the
door the drummer opened the door
the princess showed him the magic ring
and sure he remembered it all my beloved
princess I am sorry I am so sorry how
could I have forgotten you come with me
the drummer took the princess to his
parents and told them everything mother
father
she is my beloved I can marry no one
else well just as well for I cannot
marry just a drummer boy but I shall not
return the ring and the necklace you can
keep them forever I have found my true
treasure
so the drummer and the princess were
married with great feasting and
festivities and they lived happily ever
after
